In the anime noted above the story is set four years after the (gomen 
the =
spelling onegai) battle of 'Chekigahara' (Shek-ee-ga-har-a) and 
there is a=
 big Samurai kenjutsu (sword fighting) tournament being held 
by the Shogun=
 of the Toshowgowa Clan. My question is this--what year 
was that battle an=
d was there ever such a tournament? Who won? The 
anime concerns a Battousa=
i or Legendary manslayer nicknamed 'Demon Eyes 
Kyo' whose spirit/soul inha=
bits the body of a younger hero named 
Yushira. Looks like a cool series an=
d I'm told it actually has an 
ending after 24 eppys. I think that Shina th=
e gal bounty hunter's 3 
barrelled flintlock pistol is just smoke and mirro=
rs and was never a 
real weapon since flintlocks do not have rotating barre=
ls. Domo arigato 
for your assistance. Kami bless you all. Sayonara-K&K
